polynomial_functions_separates_points:
-- TODO:
-- if `f : R → R` is an affine equivalence, then pulling back along `f`
-- induces a normed algebra isomorphism between `polynomial_functions X` and
-- `polynomial_functions (f ⁻¹' X)`, intertwining the pullback along `f` of `C(R, R)` to itself.
theorem polynomial_functions_separates_points (X : set R) : (polynomial_functions X).separates_points := fun x y h =>
  by
  -- We use `polynomial.X`, then clean up.
  refine' ⟨_, ⟨⟨_, ⟨⟨polynomial.X, ⟨algebra.mem_top, rfl⟩⟩, rfl⟩⟩, _⟩⟩
  dsimp; simp only [polynomial.eval_X]
  exact fun h' => h (subtype.ext h')
#align polynomial_functions_separates_points polynomial_functions_separates_points
polynomial_functions_coe:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«exprC( , )» -/
@[simp]
theorem polynomial_functions_coe (X : set R) :
    (polynomial_functions X : set («exprC( , )» X R)) = Set.range (polynomial.to_continuous_map_on_alg_hom X) :=
  by
  ext
  simp [polynomial_functions]
#align polynomial_functions_coe polynomial_functions_coe
comap_comp_right_alg_hom_Icc_homeo_I:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `unit_interval -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `unit_interval -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- The preimage of polynomials on `[0,1]` under the pullback map by `x ↦ (b-a) * x + a`
is the polynomials on `[a,b]`. -/
theorem polynomial_functions.comap_comp_right_alg_hom_Icc_homeo_I (a b : exprℝ) (h : a < b) :
    (polynomial_functions (unit_interval)).comap
        (comp_right_alg_hom (exprℝ) (exprℝ) (Icc_homeo_I a b h).symm.to_continuous_map) =
      polynomial_functions (Set.Icc a b) :=
  by
  ext f
  fconstructor
  · rintro ⟨p, ⟨-, w⟩⟩
    rw [fun_like.ext_iff] at w
    dsimp at w
    let q := p.comp («expr • » (b - a)⁻¹ polynomial.X + polynomial.C (-a * (b - a)⁻¹))
    refine' ⟨q, ⟨_, _⟩⟩
    · simp
    · ext x
      simp only [neg_mul, RingHom.map_neg, RingHom.map_mul, alg_hom.coe_to_ring_hom, polynomial.eval_X,
        polynomial.eval_neg, polynomial.eval_C, polynomial.eval_smul, smul_eq_mul, polynomial.eval_mul,
        polynomial.eval_add, polynomial.coe_aeval_eq_eval, polynomial.eval_comp,
        polynomial.to_continuous_map_on_alg_hom_apply, polynomial.to_continuous_map_on_apply,
        polynomial.to_continuous_map_apply]
      convert w ⟨_, _⟩ <;> clear w
      · -- why does `comm_ring.add` appear here!?
        change x = (Icc_homeo_I a b h).symm ⟨_ + _, _⟩
        ext
        simp only [Icc_homeo_I_symm_apply_coe, subtype.coe_mk]
        replace h : b - a ≠ 0 := sub_ne_zero_of_ne h.ne.symm
        simp only [mul_add]
        field_simp
        ring
      · change _ + _ ∈ unit_interval
        rw [mul_comm (b - a)⁻¹, ← neg_mul, ← add_mul, ← sub_eq_add_neg]
        have w₁ : 0 < (b - a)⁻¹ := inv_pos.mpr (sub_pos.mpr h)
        have w₂ : 0 ≤ (x : exprℝ) - a := sub_nonneg.mpr x.2.1
        have w₃ : (x : exprℝ) - a ≤ b - a := sub_le_sub_right x.2.2 a
        fconstructor
        · exact mul_nonneg w₂ (le_of_lt w₁)
        · rw [← div_eq_mul_inv, div_le_one (sub_pos.mpr h)]
          exact w₃
  · rintro ⟨p, ⟨-, rfl⟩⟩
    let q := p.comp («expr • » (b - a) polynomial.X + polynomial.C a)
    refine' ⟨q, ⟨_, _⟩⟩
    · simp
    · ext x
      simp [mul_comm]
#align
  polynomial_functions.comap_comp_right_alg_hom_Icc_homeo_I polynomial_functions.comap_comp_right_alg_hom_Icc_homeo_I
aeval_continuous_map_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«exprC( , )» -/
/-

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Scott Morrison
-/
-- TODO some lemmas about when `to_continuous_map_on` is injective?
@[simp]
theorem aeval_continuous_map_apply (g : polynomial R) (f : «exprC( , )» α R) (x : α) :
    ((polynomial.aeval f) g) x = g.eval (f x) :=
  by
  apply polynomial.induction_on' g
  · intro p q hp hq
    simp [hp, hq]
  · intro n a
    simp [pi.pow_apply]
#align aeval_continuous_map_apply aeval_continuous_map_apply
